name: Go Home!
description:
The main character is a zombie who wants to go home and rest. But on the way home, he must avoid the zombie-hater humans and spikes they set to 'kill' the zombies. 

A 2D Side Scroller Platformer where the player can't attack the enemies. Like the popular phrase 'YOLO', player only have 1 live.  So even though zombies are undead, avoid the enemies and obstacles carefully because one wrong move and you're 'dead', 

This game was made to complete 2019/2020 Game Development Course Assignment.

The game itself is just a simple prototype so there will be some bugs.

Control :
Walk right = Right Arrow
Walk left = Left Arrow
Jump = Up Arrow 

Asset Credits :

  • Super Dialogue Audio Pack
  • Sounds Effects & Voice lines by PlagueChamp
  • FREE GRAVEYARD PLATFORMER TILESET
  • Kenney Game Assets
